description:
Having taken the flaming red pill, Kinmen Kashin is not only brought back from the brink of death, but now possesses power beyond imagination. Tosan Koko struggles desperately to protect her sisters from his powerful attacks but even she is no match for his immense powers. Just as all hope is seemingly lost, young Gessho steps forward and offers the power of his blood and his own life to save them. Does this mean the end of the irreplaceable Touhou spirit clan blood line?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blood of the Touhou Spirit Clan
